DOC.detailed_description: Study Therapy Administration : If find eligible take part study , take propranolol mouth 2 time day . While take drug , continue check blood pressure daily personal blood pressure machine , local pharmacy , clinic . If personally monitor blood pressure , contact research nurse systolic blood pressure ( SBP - high number ) less 110 , diastolic ( DBP - low number ) less 50 ( heart rate 50-60 show symptoms 2 different timepoints 24 hour apart ) . The study doctor may decide low raise dose study drug study base heart rate and/or blood pressure measurement . You fill pill diary write dose propranolol take day . For relaxation guide imagery session , give MP3 player audio record listen 2 time week 4 month ( long choose ) . The study staff talk complete session . You fill relaxation diary write whether able complete session whether difficulty , distraction . You bring diary clinic visit . Study Visits : At Month 1 : - Your vital sign measure . - You ask side effect may . At Months 2 4 : - Your vital sign measure . - You ask side effect may . Blood ( 5-6 teaspoon ) draw routine test test cytokine , RNA , tumor marker . - You complete questionnaire screen . - If doctor think need , EKG check heart function . - If MD Anderson participant , test find many calorie need daily basis repeat . - At Month 2 , doctor think need , CT scan chest , abdomen , pelvis check status disease . - At Month 4 , update medical history record . You physical exam . Length Treatment : You may continue study therapy long doctor think best interest . You longer able take study therapy disease get bad , intolerable side effect occur , unable follow study direction . Your active participation study last visit . The study staff continue check medical record see . This investigational study . Propranolol FDA approve commercially available treat certain heart blood pressure problem , anxiety , migraine , tremor . Its use study investigational . Up 20 participant enrol multicenter study . Up 5 enrolled Harris Health System . Up 10 enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Proven recurrent cervical cancer histology eligible curative radiotherapy surgery . 2 . Failed chemotherapy first recurrence ( exclude chemotherapy concurrent irradiation ) refractory first line systemic therapy . 3 . Measurable nonmeasurable disease 4 . Unlimited prior therapy 1 . Patients whose disease may cure surgery radiotherapy . 2 . Contraindication use betablocker . ( uncontrolled DM , COPDunstable , Bradycardia < 50 BPM ) 3 . Already receive betablocker . 4 . Performance status > 3 . Must treatment first line recurrence 5 . Prior radiation therapy localize cancer breast , head neck , skin permit provide complete 3 year prior registration , patient remain free recurrent metastatic disease . 6 . With exception nonmelanoma skin cancer specific malignancy note , patient invasive malignancy ( ) evidence cancer present within last five year whose previous cancer treatment contraindicate protocol therapy exclude . 7 . Use systemic glucocorticoid Prednisone Decadron last month great one week 8 . Inability accurately answer question ( e.g . dementia , brain metastasis ) speak English Spanish . 9 . Cirrhosis liver 10 . Patients age 18 11 . History comorbid condition : Addison 's disease , autoimmune hepatitis , hepatitis B , hepatitis C , AIDS HIV , lupus erythematosus , mixed connective tissue disease , rheumatoid arthritis . 12 . Hypersensitivity propranolol , betablockers 13 . Uncompensated congestive heart failure 14 . Cardiogenic shock 15 . Severe sinus bradycardia ; heart block , second third degree sick sinus syndrome ( artificial pacemaker present ) 16 . Severe hyperactive airway disease ( chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , asthma ) 17 . Any patient Avastin antiangiogenic drug . 18 . Patients brittle diabetes mellitus ( DM ) . Brittle diabetes mellitus type diabetes person 's blood glucose ( sugar ) level often swing quickly high low low high . Also call `` unstable diabetes '' `` labile diabetes . '' 19 . Patients participate plan participate treatment trial course study . 20 . Patients actively use cocaine 21 . Can receive active neoplastic treatment 4 month study .
